      • registerItem

        public boolean registerItem​(Module module,
                            Listener listener)
        Register a signal listener which contains method decorated with SignalHandler decorator.
        Overrides:
        registerItem in class Manager<Listener>
        Parameters:
        module - which module is registering the listener.
        listener - the listeners you want to register.
        Returns:
        true if the listener has been correctly register.
